key_backup_text_1: Ključni semenski niz se uporablja za ustvarjanje vseh naslovov. Kdor ima dostop do ključnega semenskega niza, ima delni nadzor nad denarnico.
key_backup_text_2: Varnostno kopijo ključnega semenskega niza hranite varno in zaščiteno.
key_backup_text_3: Izguba ključnega semenskega niza bo povzročila izgubo dostopa do vaše denarnice.
seed_phrase_backed_up: Varnostno kopiral sem svojo ključno semensko frazo na varno mesto.
key_seed_info: SSP ključ in SSP denarnica morata uporabljati edinstvene, različne semenske fraze.
err_enter_seed: Prosimo, vnesite svojo ključno semensko frazo
err_invalid_seed: Ključna semenska fraza ni veljavna. Ključna semenska fraza vsebuje najmanj 12 besed.
err_seed_invalid_words: Ključna semenska fraza vsebuje neveljavne besede: {{words}}.
err_seed_invalid_spaces: Ključna semenska fraza vsebuje odvečne presledke.
backup_needed: Preden lahko sinhronizirate ključ, morate varnostno kopirati ključno semensko frazo.
err_setting_key: Pri nastavitvi ključa je prišlo do napake.
input_mnemonic: Vnesite svojo mnemonično ključno semensko frazo
ssp_key_mnemonic_sec: WARNING: For security reasons, the seed phrase is displayed in 3 parts. Please join them together to get the full seed phrase. It is highly discouraged to copy the seed phrase into your clipboard, any application or website has access to clipboard and can see your seed phrase. Remember to delete the seed phrase from your clipboard after copying!
strong_password: Strong password should contain at least 8 characters, 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, 1 number, and 1 special character.
weak_password_info: Your password is weak which affects the security of your key.
weak_password_confirm: Would you like to change it?
weak_password_confirm_cancel: Yes, I want to change it.
rooted_device: Your device appears to be rooted! This significantly compromises the security of the SSP Key!
jailbroken_device: Your device appears to be jailbroken! This significantly compromises the security of the SSP Key!
